text:
We may disclose your information if required by law or if we believe in good faith that such action is necessary to comply with legal processes, respond to claims, or protect the rights, property, or safety of our operations, customers, or the public.
We store your information on secure servers with limited access.
When you synchronize your Google Calendar with Weezly, we access your calendar data.
We use the information we collect to operate Weezly, including allowing you to manage your calendar and schedule through our platform.
